content:
Check:
  all:
    - name:
      operator:
    - name: RACE
      operator: not_equal_to
      value: UNKNOWN
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SDTMIG.CG0526
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: Trigger error when subject does not specify race and RACE is not equal
  to "UNKNOWN"
Outcome:
  Message: RACE is not equal to "UNKNOWN" when subject did not specify race
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0526
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: 'If a subject refuses to provide or does not know
                  their race information, the value of RACE could be “UNKNOWN”. '
                Document: IG v3.4
                Item: Assumption 6
                Section: '5.2'
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - SPECIAL-PURPOSE
  Domains:
    Include:
      - DM

json.Description: Trigger error when subject does not specify race and RACE is not equal to "UNKNOWN"

Outcome.Message: RACE is not equal to "UNKNOWN" when subject did not specify race

Citations.Cited_Guidance: If a subject refuses to provide or does not know their race information, the value of RACE could be “UNKNOWN”.
